1: When I am in trouble, I call vpon ye LORDE, & he answereth me.
2: Delyuer my soule (o LORDE) fro lyenge lippes, & fro a disceatfull toge.
3: What rewarde shalbe geuen or done vnto the, thou false tonge?
4: Euen mightie & sharpe arowes, wt hote burnige coales.
5: Wo is me yt my banishmet endureth sologe: I dwell in the tabernacles of the soroufull.
6: My soule hath loge dwelt amonge them, that be enemies vnto peace.
7: I laboured for peace, but when I spake therof, they made them to batayll.
